vogar

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • vogar.Action

  • public final class Action
extends java.lang.Object
    A named job such as a test or benchmark run. This class tracks the resource files and classes for compiling and running a Java source file.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String actionClass 
      private java.io.File javaFile 
      private java.lang.String name 
      private java.io.File resourcesDirectory 
      private java.io.File sourcePath 
      private static java.lang.String TEST_ROOT 
      private java.io.File userDir 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Action(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String actionClass, java.io.File resourcesDirectory, java.io.File sourcePath, java.io.File javaFile) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.File getJavaFile()
      Returns this action's java file, or null if this file wasn't built from source.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns a unique identifier for this action.
      java.io.File getResourcesDirectory()
      Returns the local directory containing this action's required resource files, or null if this action is standalone.
      java.io.File getSourcePath()
      Returns this action's source path, or null if this file wasn't built from source.
      java.lang.String getTargetClass()
      Returns the executable classname, such as java.lang.IntegerTest or BitTwiddle.
      java.io.File getUserDir() 
      static java.lang.String nameForJavaFile(java.io.File javaFile)
      Returns an action name appropriate for the given .java file without first reading the contents of the file.
      void setUserDir(java.io.File base)
      Initializes the directory from which local files can be read by the action.
      java.lang.String toString() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
